name: Raging Blocks First Level
description:
Controls:

  • Left & Right Arrow Keys to move piece left and right
  • Up Arrow Key to rotate piece clockwise
  • Down Arrow Key to speed up piece descent
  • R to restart level

Fate of the project is likely on hold indefinitely.

This is the first level in what would be a series of random levels with different game mechanics. I won't spoil what makes this level different from regular Tetris.

Connect enough rows to pass the level.

Special thanks to Noah Cline for making this all possible.
